name: GOULBURN FLIGHT TRAINING ACADEMY PTY LTD
about: Goulburn Flight Training Centre is a premier aviation institution dedicated to excellence in flight training. Located at Goulburn Airport in Australia, we offer a wide range of services from trial introductory flights to advanced courses in civil and recreational aviation. Our team, led by Chief Flight Instructor Malcolm Poulton, boasts extensive experience in flight training, airlines, and commercial operations. We prioritize high standards of safety and advanced training, ensuring our pilots are among the finest in the industry. Students have opportunities to grow professionally within our organisation, with roles such as flight instructors, ground instructors, and administrative positions available. Whether you're pursuing a career or a hobby, Goulburn Flight Training Centre provides a comprehensive and supportive learning environment to help you achieve your aviation goals.
